heading: Parlez-vous français?
paragraph: Not yet? Parfait! Book your free French class today and start speaking the language of Molière (or be able to order an apéritif in a Parisian bar)!

heading: The French your kids will love
paragraph: Swap the Wimpy Kid for Tintin and Asterix! Book a free French class for your child today and see them immerse themselves in the French culture.

heading: Make French connections
paragraph: Whatever your industry, speaking the language of your business partners and clients can make a difference between a maybe and a bien sûr.
paragraphTwo: So don't hold your business back. Book your free French class today and start making new connections.
